channel.title: I need help with STEAM.
channel.description:
I'll get right to it.
Day of Defeat: Source has been updating on STEAM for around 3 months now. It got to 98% and then it stopped and said suspended. Its at 823MB out of 869MB and it's been suspended for over 3 months. Every time i try to resume the update this happens. Hit Resume. It says "Updating" for like 1 second. Then immediately goes back to being suspended.:FFFUUU::FFFUUU::FFFUUU: If anyone knows how to fix this please help me.
Thanks ~Teh Frog.

item.title: I need help with STEAM.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
done. glad you found your help.

Read full topic

item.description:
Wow… I can’t believe I didn’t do that. That was it. Thanks. Now… is there a way to delete this thread?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with STEAM.

item.description:
Have you tried re-installing it? That should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with STEAM.
item.dc:creator: Teh_Frog
item.description:
I’ll get right to it.

Day of Defeat: Source has been updating on STEAM for around 3 months now. It got to 98% and then it stopped and said suspended. Its at 823MB out of 869MB and it’s been suspended for over 3 months. Every time i try to resume the update this happens.
Hit Resume.
It says “Updating” for like 1 second.
Then immediately goes back to being suspended.:FFFUUU::FFFUUU::FFFUUU:
If anyone knows how to fix this please help me.

Thanks
~Teh Frog.
